title: "Love, Death and Robots, Shenzhen-style"
excerpt: "An original dance drama, titled AI in Love, was staged at Beijing's National Center for the Performing Arts between Aug 25 and 27. Exploring the relationship between humanity and artificial intelligence, it tells the story of Xiaohai, who loses his mother in an accident as a child, and grows up in the company of AI robots."
